thread.title: Making a cave in Maya then import it into Doom 3 video.

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
Now you can learn how to make a cave into Doom3 with my video tutorial. I think I mite have repeat my self abit but I dont want to start over and over on this. I also included a source file so you can get the model ready for Doom3 and the texture I used for it.
http://files.filefront.com/Caves_In_May ... einfo.html

post.author: ajm113
post.body: Sorry for double posting, but jess nothing? Not even one comment or anything?

post.author: tokiWarT00th
post.body:
I thought it was pretty imformative dude. Nice work and effort in helping out the community. I think next time you do someting for a test like that you could probably get away with just auto mapping your uv's just to give you an idea what the texture is gonna look like once you put some effort into it.

Keep it up man.

post.author: ajm113
post.body: Thanks, keep a look out for more. I will update my site now and then with new tutorials. I still have to update that page but Im out of town and the files of my website are on my pc at home.

post.author: tokiWarT00th
post.body: Np dude...if you ever need any help with maya or anything just shoot me a message, I would be glad to help. Look forward to seeing more of your work.
